localization.createAcct_tooltip: Create an account so that you can manage and comment on videos.

localization.playlist_add_dialog_title: Add to a Playlist on Your Channel
localization.playlist_add_dialog_subtitle: Select one of your playlists to add the video or create a new playlist.
localization.playlist_add_error_text: An error occurred adding this video to your playlist. Please try again.
localization.playlist_add_max: This playlist has reached its maximum number of allowed videos. You must first remove a video from this playlist before adding new videos.
localization.playlist_max: You have the maximum number of playlists allowed. To create a new playlist you must first remove a playlist from Your Channel.
localization.playlist_create_exists: A playlist with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
localization.playlist_create_error_text: An error occurred creating this playlist. Please try again.
localization.playlist_edit_dialog_subtitle: Drag and drop playlists to change the order. Click on playlist titles to rename.
localization.playlist_remove_error_text: An error occurred removing this video from your playlist. Please try again.
localization.playlist_delete_error_text: An error occurred removing this playlist. Please try again.
localization.playlist_reorder_error_text: An error occurred reordering your playlists. Please try again.
localization.playlist_fetch_error_text: An error occurred fetching your playlists. Please ensure that you're logged in and try again.
localization.playlist_rename_error_text: An error occurred renaming this playlist. Please try again.
localization.playlist_rename_exists: A playlist with this name already exists.

localization.help_createacct_desc: Create an account so that you may create your own playlist, subscribe to topics of interest and watch recommended videos.
localization.help_epg_desc: See what is playing on Al Jazeera now and for the next week.
localization.help_recommendations_desc: These videos are recommended to you based on {0}.
localization.help_playlists_desc: Create your own custom playlists and add video you find throughout the site.
localization.help_subscriptions_desc: To subscribe to topics and  videos, click the 'Subscribe' button when you see a list of videos you want to track.
localization.help_unfinishedvideos_desc: Resume videos you did not finis  watching

localization.help_preferredlocale_desc: Select the country that you live in
